name: Plague Friend's Deathly Journey (Post Jam Version)
name_original: Plague Friend's Deathly Journey (Post Jam Version)
description:
A post-game jam version of:
https://sakura-magika.itch.io/plague-friends-deathly-journey

Controls:

  • Move with arrow keys
  • Jump / Talk / Interact with Spacebar 

New Features:

  • Dynamic celestial bodies
  • Ye mystical clock
  • Improved and additional (secret) dialogue
  • Various visual polishings

Plague Friend is stuck in a time loop of leeching their patient. There's got to be some way to escape! Travel back and forth in Plague Friend's timeline, talk to people, and leech your way out of the loop.

This is my first Ludum Dare and my first game ever. I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!

Changelog:

  • v2.00 - Initial release
  • v2.01 - Come to life update
    • Add dialogue bounce for each character
    • Add dialogue % complete on game over screen
    • Fix getting stuck if you backtrack at a certain point
    • Dialogue improvements & polish
